name: Jackie’s Eco Park Match 3 Game
description:
Let's change the world for the better!
We are very happy to present a new match 3 game with an ecological perspective: “Jackie’s Eco Park”. Build your own wonderful ECO Park!

“Jackie’s Eco Park” - a colourful green puzzle game for children and adults. Enjoy hundreds of interesting and challenging levels, solve puzzles and rescue animals.
Collect juicy fruits three in a row, blow up bonuses and complete tasks. Earn coins for completing levels and use them to buy decorations for your parks.
Decorate parks to your liking and populate them with animals together with Jackie. Help the animals find a new home!

The game is released with the support of the World Wildlife Fund (WWF). Playing the game, you are making our planet better!

Have you ever wanted to change this world for the better?
Take on the challenge, save the world’s ecology and make the abandoned lands blossom again!

Game features:
- many unique and dynamic match-3 levels
- juicy explosive bonuses!
- plant trees and flowers, make the planet green and cozy again
- hundreds of Eco decorations for parks
- create new green homes for the animals you save

The bright green world of Jackie’s Eco Park, populated with interesting characters, will not leave anyone indifferent!

Send questions, comments and suggestions to support@ninjapublishing.com
